attributes.action: Stop all MP's refering to each other as honourable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the disgraceful behaviour of Members of Parliament I feel that although it may be within the rules of the house to refer to members as honourable, this action no longer stands up to public scrutiny and should therefore be scrapped. Perhaps an independent enquiry can be set up to determine what adjective would be best suited to describe MPs. For instance... "The (...) from Scunthorpe".

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
